4 Stress Area, in.” = 0.7854 [D - 0.9743/ n] ® where D = nominal diameter, in., and n= threads/in.

® Based on 125 000 psi for sizes 4 to 2% in., inclusive, and on 115 000 psi for sizes over 2% to 4 in., inclusive.

© Based on 105 000 psi for sizes Y to 2% in., inclusive, and on 95 000 psi for sizes over 2% to 4 in., inclusive.

Based on 109 000 psi for sizes % to 2% in., inclusive, and on 99 000 psi for sizes over 2¥6 to 4 in., inclusive.

© Based on 150 000 psi for sizes ¥% to 2% in., inclusive, and on 140 000 psi for sizes over 2% to 4 in., inclusive.
* Based on 120 000 psi for sizes % to 2% in., inclusive, and on 105 000 psi for sizes over 2¥% to 4 in., inclusive.
© Based on 130 000 psi for sizes % to 2¥ in., inclusive, and on 115 000 psi for sizes over 2¥6 to 4 in., inclusive.
